#summary &chcy; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &chcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&CHcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0427/index.htm U+00427].
  * `&chcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0447/index.htm U+00447].
